recipe.title: Ginger-Cilantro Chutney
ingredients: 1 (1 1/4-inch-long) piece peeled fresh ginger, thinly sliced
instructions: With small processor running, add green onions, chiles, and ginger through feed tube; process until minced. Add cilantro, lime juice, and water. Process until smooth. Add yogurt, sugar, and salt; process. Transfer to bowl. Do ahead Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover; chill.
